name: metrics_shred
description: Metrics snapshot for the shred tile

microblocks_abandoned.description: The number of microblocks that were abandoned because we switched slots without finishing the current slot

invalid_block_id.description: The number of times a block was created with unknown parent block_id

shred_processed.description: The result of processing a shred from the network

shred_processed_bad_slot.description: Shred was for a slot for which we don't know the leader

shred_processed_rejected.description: Shred was invalid for one of many reasons

shred_processed_ignored.description: Shred was ignored because we had already received or reconstructed it

shred_processed_okay.description: Shred accepted to an incomplete FEC set

shred_processed_completes.description: Shred accepted and resulted in a valid, complete FEC set

fec_set_spilled.description: The number of FEC sets that were spilled because they didn't complete in time and we needed space

shred_rejected_initial.description: The number of shreds that were rejected before any resources were allocated for the FEC set

shred_rejected_unchained.description: The number of shreds that were rejected because they're not chained merkle shreds

fec_rejected_fatal.description: The number of FEC sets that were rejected for reasons that cause the whole FEC set to become invalid

force_complete_request.description: The number of times we received a FEC force complete message

force_complete_failure.description: The number of times we failed to force complete a FEC set on request

force_complete_success.description: The number of times we successfully forced completed a FEC set on request

shred_repair_rcv.description: The number of times we received a repair shred

shred_repair_rcv_bytes.description: The number bytes received from network packets with repair shreds. Bytes include network headers

shred_turbine_rcv.description: The number of times we received a turbine shred

shred_turbine_rcv_bytes.description: The number bytes received from network packets with turbine shreds. Bytes include network headers
